normal tshirt, its expected.

Similar to other reviews, my shirt was white instead of cream colored, the text was more blue than purple, the tshirt material was a stretchy, sheer material, and the size overall was smaller than anticipated.

Looooove the fit, will come in handy for dysphoric days!!! Nonsense words written on the patches and stuff, so if you really care I would look at a brand like Cool Shirtz or Aelfric Eden for graphic tees. In general I quite like it and it’s true to size (I usually wear medium ordered large for a baggy fit)

While this shirt is soft, has a nice amount of stretch, and make my daughter happy, the graphics on the back stick together and have peeled away from the shirt and each other. The shirt doesn’t haven any internal tags to specify laundering rules- but everything is washed in cold water with mild detergent.  I’ve washed it three times and each time it’s worse. Very, very, very disappointed.
It fits like a normal Tshirt, wish I would have ordered a size up for it to be oversized thats my bad. But the color is alot lighter than the picture it's more of a lilac

评论概述: Go 2 sizes up if you want it longer
评论详情: The shirt is great! It’s soft and very roomy and I love that. I’m a medium and so I got a large so it be longer. But it wasn’t as long as I wanted it to be. They run small. The large was the length of a regular large. So if you’re like me and want a longer baggy type shirt I’d get 2 sizes up. Other than that, it fits great. Baggy and relaxed. I’ll still wear it. The design, color and feel is great! 😊
Very low print quality but very comfy and nice oversized look. Good for at home

The shirt is alright. It fits as expected, but I'm a little disappointed on how the image looked. It didn't look exactly like the picture. The bear is mostly covered in white. I also thought the color of the shirt was going to be darker, but it's not. Plus, the bear graphic doesn't really feel comfortable. It feels rough. Like sandpaper kinda. Not really recommend...

It's definitely not like the men-cut as the image describes. the shirt cut is of a regular shirt. I did up-size quite abit (because of my man-shoulders and I liked oversized T-shirts) but this was *just* right, besides the underarms (which were unbearably too small). the front image is much...higher lol. it was almost to my shoulder. the material was definitely on the thicker size. Wouldn't recommend as a loose shirt, just as a regular shirt. It's not a bad shirt, just hoped it would look like the image and wasn't so small but I guess it is based off Asian sizing, so I can't really be mad.

Bought a shirt for my tween daughter in the biggest size because she wanted the "oversized look" and it came in perfect. It comes down pretty close to her knee. I do regret not getting a large because of how big it is on her. I think if she wanted more of a fitted look, she would've gotten a medium. Lemme say she is around 5' and is a skinny kid, so don't make the same mistake as me and buy the largest size if your physique is pretty similar. The material was cotton and the graphic has stayed after a couple washes. I certainly will be buying from this seller again.

I ordered an xl i usually wear small a though it’s very oversized but that’s how i like it. If you’re also usually a small and like oversized i would say get the large for a more “normal” oversized look.
